fields.name: time_day
fields.description: Time of day in XXXXXXXX_HHMM_HHMM format, where XXXXXXXX is a bitmap of days of the week, Sunday-Saturday, Holiday. The HHMM are the start and end times.

fields.name: timeday_id
fields.description: Time of day set. Used if times-of-day are defined on the time_set_definitions table

fields.name: start_ib_lane
fields.description: Innermost lane number the movement applies to at the inbound end.

fields.name: end_ib_lane
fields.description: Outermost lane number the movement applies to at the inbound end. Blank indicates a movement with a single inbound lane.

fields.name: start_ob_lane
fields.description: Innermost lane number the movement applies to at the outbound end.

fields.name: end_ob_lane
fields.description: Outermost lane number the movement applies to at the outbound end. Blank indicates a movement with a single outbound lane.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Optional. Describes the type of movement (left, right, thru, etc.).

fields.name: mvmt_code
fields.description: Optional. Movement code (e.g., SBL).  Syntax is DDTN, where DD is the direction (e.g., SB, NB, EB, WB, NE, NW, SE, SW). T is the turning movement (e.g., R, L, T) and N is an optional turning movement number (e.g., distinguishing between bearing right and a sharp right at a 6-way intersection)

fields.name: allowed_uses
fields.description: Optional. Set of allowed uses that should appear in either the use_definition or use_group tables; comma-separated.

name: movement_tod.schema.json
description: Handles day-of-week and time-of-day restrictions on movements.
